alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Ness; Rush; Trego (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 01 at 3:40AM CST until January 02 at 11:00AM CST by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 11 AM CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. For the first Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero. For the second Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero. * WHERE...Trego, Ellis, Ness and Rush Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 6 PM CST this evening. For the first Wind Chill Advisory, until noon CST today. For the second Wind Chill Advisory, from midnight tonight to 11 AM CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
